github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: ALWAYS include the emoji - this is required
Emoji mapping by type: feat=:sparkles:, fix=:bug:, refactor=:recycle:, docs=:memo:, test=:white_check_mark:, chore=:wrench:, perf=:zap:, style=:art:
Special emojis: localization=:globe_with_meridians:, move/rename=:truck:, breaking=:boom:, security=:lock:, remove=:fire:, UI/UX=:children_crossing:
Use imperative present tense: 'add', 'update', 'fix', not 'added' or 'fixes'
Keep description concise - aim for < 50 chars, max 72. Omit filler words like 'functionality', 'to enhance', 'for better'
No trailing period. No scope needed unless clarifying ambiguity
